tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOLYGONS False output_data_CENTROIDS $output_data_CENTROIDS name SAGA.shapes_polygons.1 POLYGONS $POLYGONS METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CENTROIDS $OutputSection_CENTROIDS.outputType_CENTROIDS transmissionMode_CENTROIDS $OutputSection_CENTROIDS.transmissionMode_CENTROIDS

param.name: POLYGONS
param.label: Polygons
param.help: Polygons The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CENTROIDS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CENTROIDS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Creates a points layer containing the centroids of the input polygon layer.
